Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory83.jpg'}
{3: 'Two hours into waiting for him in his "secret lair," you finally find Changyu slipping through the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Haha, sorry for leaving y'all up there.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Cheekily he shrugs and wipes off the rain from his mechanical parts, looking anything but apologetic.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'So, what are you doing here? Is Babylonia after that black market as well?', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's right.", 3: '10', 4: 'What about you?', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Hmm, well, well...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu takes a long look at the four of you and stops when his eyes reach your tired appearance.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "You look like you'd walked through a rainstorm. And when was the last time you rest up?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He deftly climbs up the racks behind him and throws a box down.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "C'mon, let's get you something to eat.", 4: '1'}
{1: '311', 2: "That's not necessary.", 3: '22', 4: "That's unusually generous of you.", 5: '23'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Let's call it my apologies—not to mention that there's this itsy-bitsy problem I can use your help with.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Ha, nothing can get past you! There's this itsy-bitsy problem I can use your help with.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What problem?', 3: '26', 4: 'Anything to do with that man back there?', 5: '26'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Oh, slow down!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu tears open the box he took, grabbing two cans of canned food, a couple of condiments, and a self-heating cooking pot.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "C'mon, it's obviously just food stocked in the warehouses.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'One of Akdilek\'s many ventures is reselling food. Occasionally I\'ll "liberate" some of the ingredients upstairs and keep them here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Y'know, just to reminisce... how people used to gather and feast.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Sure, I no longer have to eat, but I still love to cook. It's nice when others enjoy my cooking.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He deftly opens the red can and mixes in a few different spices, stirring everything together. Next is the white can, which he opens and takes out a few white, circular discs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Are those... made with actual flour?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'That\'s right; these are wrappers for this famous Kowloong dish called "jiaozi." Y\'all can give it a try once I\'m done!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '—If the commandant approves.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1000', 2: 'Well, they are made by Changyu...', 3: '1044', 4: 'Well, if these are made in Kowloong...', 5: '1045'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Ha! Is that a compliment, or are you just worried?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "To be fair, Kowloong doesn't make these cans the way they used to.", 4: '1'}

{3: 'He spoons out a portion of the fillings from the red can and stuffs them into a piece of wrapper. Holding it in his palm, he folds the edges of the wrapper and turns the whole fare into a wrinkly dough.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "They ought to look better, but that would be way too much work for me, so you'll have to make do with this.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Changyu's hands briskly move around as he speaks. Before you know it, he has finished wrapping a whole plate of jiaozi."}
{2: 'That was quick!', 3: '50'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Oh? Maybe it's because the motion of wrapping jiaozi is pretty similar to my martial art training. Check this out—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu slows down his movement to demonstrate. With a wrapper in his left hand and the spoon on his right, he takes some fillings from the can and stuffs them into his left palm.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: '...And squeeze. Done!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It does look like the opening moves of a martial art set.', 3: '54', 4: 'If you just ignore how they turn out...', 5: '56'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Right? It makes sense once you speed it up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Tch. Picky eaters get field rations for dinner.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu turns around and grabs a bucket hanging on a nearby pipe, pouring the water inside into the cooking pot.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The piping still works here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "It's more of a filter than a pipe, if anything. It purifies the rainwater collected above ground.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Relax, though. Sure, it's not completely sterilized, but it's clean enough to drink.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Throwing the jiaozi into the pot, Changyu seasons them with a pinch of salt. The water quickly begins bubbling.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Almost there...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He lightly rinses the plate in his hand with the boiling water.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "You mean rinsing the plate with hot water? That's just common Kowloong practice. Our people believe doing so keeps the containers clean and the eaters healthy.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Changyu fishes out a whole plate of... grotesque and twisted shapes.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'And done! Give it a try!', 4: '1'}
{2: '...A try it is.', 3: '75', 4: '...I could use a little courage here.', 5: '75'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "If they taste bad, it's because you've got bad taste.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You pick one up with a fork as everyone has their eyes on you—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "This isn't your typical rations, you moron! Blow on the food before you stuff it in your mouth.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Taking a closer look at your half-eaten dumpling, you cannot believe how fragrant this swirling mess of black and brown bits is.'}
{3: '...Even though the boiled wrapper looks like a piece of crumpled paper in the trash. But, hey, there is no denying that it is indeed very tasty.'}
{2: 'This is amazing!', 3: '88', 4: 'Everyone, come and try it!', 5: '88'}
{3: 'Hearing that, the three Gray Ravens look visibly tempted.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not that we have to eat—but if you recommend it, Commandant, then...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia only thinks for a moment before picking up one for a bite.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Is this what Kowloong cuisine tastes like? It's really wonderful. Do you guys want one?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv grabs the fork from Lucia and takes a bite.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's quite delicious. Let me run a scan on the ingredients... Oh, the nutritional balance is well-thought-out as well. Commandant, you can eat as much as you want.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How about you, Lee?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll pass. Save them for the commandant.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Now, some thoughts to go with your food.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Munch munch munch)', 3: '107', 4: 'Shoot.', 5: '107'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'This adulterating business has been bad business for Akdilek as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "The counterfeits are barely discernable, and it takes way too long to inspect every single one of 'em. We'll be forced to use the knockoffs in any emergency.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Our bases on the ground are similarly compromised.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu pulls up a chair to his side. Leaning on it, he fiddles with the spoon he used earlier, looking buried in thought.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I'm very close to seeing their boss. I imagine he's got information y'all want.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'How about a deal? Get rid of the man by my side, and you get to keep his token.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "His clothes as well, so you can play dress-up afterward, and we'll pay their boss a visit together.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Who's that man?", 3: '119'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'A mole from the dock. He was planted on Akdilek originally, but now he just keeps tabs on me.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Can't you take him out yourself?", 3: '121'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Of course I can! But they know I'll beat his ass, so they've installed this irritating device on me as a contingency.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'If we act unprovoked...', 3: '123', 4: 'What about the "inside men" he mentioned?', 5: '123'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Relax. Do me this favor, and I'll take care of the rest.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You'll be putting the commandant in harm's way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'And why would we have to stick our noses into your "family matters"?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Are you holding a grudge, Lee? And I thought we were family!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Look, get ahold of the token, and it'll take us to whoever is in charge. You can find out any information you need.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'We businessmen call it—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "WIN—WIN—It's a win-win!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "You know what, it doesn't matter—I just need 【kuroname】 alone. So what do you say?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Deal.', 3: '141', 4: '...This is the path of least resistance.', 5: '141'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "That's the spirit!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'In that case, Commandant, I await your command!', 4: '1'}
